name: Locked (Jam version)
description:
My submission for the Paint Jam 2021, a 2 days long jam where the rule is to make everything in MS Paint or using only the tools MS Paint has (except for transparency), so everything you see was made that way!

Goal

Escape the forest by collecting 4 Campbell's Tomato Soups, so you can get stronger and open the gate that prevents you from escaping. Be cautious, there is something that does not want you to leave...

The forest is generated at every play, so it is always different.

Controls

W A S D = Movement
E = interact (loot, open gate)

Optional challenges I decided to take
  • Make all your own sound effects using only sounds you can make with your mouth (Recorded with audacity and manipulated a bit
  • Make a 3D game only using flat images. No meshes except for like the world/levels
  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet.
  • Try to make the title/logo without any real type/font
